item.description:
Swing dance season resumes! Dinner at Uno Chicago Grill (fka Pizzeria Uno) in Newton Corner, followed by a swing dance at the St. James Armenian Cultural Center in Watertown. There is a free beginner's lesson from 8-9 pm and the dance is from 9-12pm. The featured band is Beantown Swing Orchestra.

RSVP: Required by Sept 12 (next two days are RH).
MEET: 6:00 pm at Uno Chicago Grill, in Newton.
Get swing dance info. at http://www.bostonswin...
COST: money for dinner, $13 for the dance + $5 non-members

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: DINNER AND SWING DANCING
